name: Cardiology
describe: Cardiology is a branch of medicine that deals with the disorders of the heart as well as some parts of the circulatory system.

name: Urology
describe: Urology is a part of health care that deals with diseases of the male and female urinary tract (kidneys, ureters, bladder and urethra).

name: Dental Care
describe: Oral hygiene is the practice of keeping one's mouth clean and other problems by regular brushing of the teeth.

name: Eye Care
describe: An eye care professional is an individual who provides a service related to the eyes or vision.

name: Neurology
describe: Neurology is the branch of medicine treatment of disorders of the nervous system.

name: Plastic Surgery
describe: Plastic surgery is a surgical specialty involving the restoration, or alteration of the human body.
